titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for prizing of vvines.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Whitehall, the eighteenth day of February, in the eighth yeere of the reigne of our souereigne lord, Charles ..
Imprint from colophon; the publication year is given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 21; Steele notation: of By 2) the bee.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
